data.name: Fishing at Lotus Lakes
data.detailed_description:
This is a leisure and entertainment game that simulates fishing. You can experience the fun of fishing with a simple mouse and keyboard. The lakeside huts are surrounded by mountains, so you can enjoy fishing time comfortably, and you can also browse the beautiful scenery around you. The scoreboard also records the type and value of the fish you catch, so get a good harvest in the game.

Instructions:
A/S/D/W--walking
TAB--Menu
Left mouse button-throw fishing rod
On the mouse wheel-take-up
Under the mouse wheel-take-up

data.short_description: This is a leisure and entertainment game that simulates fishing. You can experience the fun of fishing with a simple mouse and keyboard. Enjoy fishing time and browse the beautiful scenery around you. The scoreboard will also record the type and value of the fish caught.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7\8\10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
